The Oblitercons:




A mere ninety kilograms? the Oblitercon leader thought.  One little bump in 
the path of glory and we're suddenly worthless?

"Very well, but without appropriate amounts of energon for the necessary 
uprgrades our performance will not increase by our desired amount," Dark One 
spoke up over the comm.  He ended the transmission from his side abruptly.  
"That idiot." he said.  "He'll regret that."

"Yeah.  We'll still have enough." Hiss said after doing some quick 
calculations.

"Hiss, Breakdown, and Scavenger will go to the lab and begin the 
modifications.  Pyro and I will go collect our long overdue payment."

"Alright." Scavenger said, still wondering why he needed an upgrade.  The 
five Oblitercons split into two groups and headed off in sepereate directions.
